personal.name: Zubair Jamil
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer
personal.bio: I'm a Software Engineer, working mainly with .NET, Angular, and cloud tools, keeping my code clean and easy to manage. I care about getting things done quickly without making a mess for the future. I'm excited to join a team where I can build real solutions that help the company grow.

featured.title: NetSuite Integration
featured.description: Integration of NetSuite with Telestra Purple for leave management, enabling seamless data flow and improved HR processes.

featured.title: Aurora - Mortgage Management System
featured.description: A comprehensive mortgage management system that streamlines the loan application process, automating tasks and improving efficiency.

projects.title: Deimos - Customer Portal (Aurora)
projects.description: A customer portal for Aurora that allows users to manage their mortgage applications, track progress, and communicate with loan officers.

projects.title: MTS - Trading System
projects.description: A trading system for managing and executing trades in financial markets. It provides real-time data analysis and trade execution capabilities.

experience.description: Developed responsive web interfaces for various client projects using React and Angular. Collaborated with UX designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
highlights: Dual Authentication system using Entra ID and Asp .NET Core Identity
Reduced data retrieval time by 40% through optimized API calls
Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to peers
Set up Azure DevOps for pull requests, branching strategies, and CI/CD pipelines

experience.description: Senior Developer responsible for designing and implementing web applications using .NET Core and Angular. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
highlights: Query optimization led to 30% performance improvement
Mentored junior developers and introduced code review process
Led migration from legacy system to modern tech stack
Followed Agile methodologies to ensure timely delivery of projects

education.description: Graduated with honors. Participated in multiple hackathons and coding competitions.
Completed with a focus on programming and software development. Actively participated in extracurricular activities related to technology.

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure DevOps Engineer Expert
certifications.description: Expert-level certification demonstrating proficiency in Azure DevOps practices and tools.

certifications.name: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
certifications.description: Comprehensive program covering modern web development using React, Node.js, and database technologies.

certifications.name: Azure Fundamentals
certifications.description: Fundamental knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

certifications.name: Build distributed apps with .NET Aspire
certifications.description: Learn how to build distributed applications using .NET and Azure. This course covers microservices architecture, Azure Functions, and more.

volunteering.description: Engaging with the developer community to promote learning and sharing knowledge about Microsoft technologies. Organizing workshops and events to help students gain practical experience.
achievements: Hosted Events on Azure and .NET technologies
Helped students prepare for Microsoft certifications
Mentored students in software development best practices

linkedinRecommendations.name: Noman Arif
linkedinRecommendations.title: Tech Lead
linkedinRecommendations.text: Zubair is a highly skilled software engineer with a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies. He has a knack for solving complex problems and is always eager to learn new things. His contributions to our projects have been invaluable, and I highly recommend him for any software development role.

linkedinRecommendations.name: Salman Najam
linkedinRecommendations.title: CEO
linkedinRecommendations.text: I had the pleasure of working with Zubair Jamil as a software engineer. He is highly skilled in C#, OOP, .NET, Angular, and DevOps, consistently delivering high-quality work on time. Zubair is punctual, intelligent, and a friendly, reliable team member. I highly recommend him for any future opportunities..

linkedinRecommendations.name: Sermad Ahmed
linkedinRecommendations.title: Software Engineer
linkedinRecommendations.text: Zubair is a highly skilled and dedicated software engineer with a sharp problem-solving mindset. His expertise in .NET and Azure, combined with his passion for innovation, makes him a standout professional. I would never miss a chance to work with him!
